About.label: About me
About.title: I'm developer
About.description: What's up! My name is Alexander and I am a developer. I have been programming since 2017 and have implemented projects such as websites, bots, desktop applications for Windows and game servers. Now I am deeply developing in web development and learning more and more new technologies to become better.

Footer.quote: Living, learning, & leveling up one day at a time.
